GULF OF MEXICO.
TEXAS.
DNC 15.
1. DERELICT 15 FOOT VESSEL, WHITE HULL, PARTIALLY SUBMERGED
   AND ADRIFT IN 28-00.00N 094-52.66W AT 011413Z SEP.
   VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT.
   REPORTS TO RCC NEW ORLEANS,
   PHONE: 855 485 3727, 504 365 2209,
   FAX: 504 589 2148,
   E-MAIL: D8COMMANDCENTER@USCG.MIL.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 2175/22.
3. CANCEL THIS MSG 042200Z SEP 22.
